title: contactPoint
description: Contact info containing one or more phone numbers, email addresses and/or website URLs.

phone.description: List of phone numbers for contact purposes (can be empty)

items.description: Phone number for contact purposes. Can be an empty string, if no phone numbers are avaialble

email.description: List of email addresses for contact purposes (can be empty)

items.description: Email address for contact purposes. Can be an empty string, if no e-mails are avaialble

url.description: List of URLs for contact purposes (can be empty)

items.description: URL to a website for contact purposes. Can be an empty string, if no urls are avaialble
